embed.title: GWG | Bronze to Gold #2 by Gaming With Gamers
embed.description: English] A bronze to gold tournament made for less experienced players. We want to give them the opportunity to win...

replies.body:
Hey! 

I'm a GWG admin.

Sorry but as the rules say you CAN'T participate if you are smurfs or if you aren't a player who is Bronze to Gold.
I'm sorry but if you participate I will have to notify Riot Games about your accounts (your main account and your smurf) because you won't respect our rules neither Riot Games rules.

I hope you understand!
